Text: GMAT Course Offeringpreparation course presented by the Princeton Review The next GMAT course will begin August weekly meetings held at the Enron Building in EB C pm for hours st meeting will be hours to include initial exam on Tuesdays Classes begin Tuesday August Last class will be Tuesday Oct Class size limited to students hours of class time Reimbursements Complete the Education Assistance Form Attached and forward to Brad Stewart EB for preapproval The form will be returned to you Obtain a certificate and receipt from The Princeton Review Upon completion of the course Associates and Analysts should forward their receipt course certificate and Education Assitance Form to Brad Stewart x EB for approval and processing Register directly with the Princeton Review Call Amy Fogarty GMAT Course Director at Monday Friday Pay tuition with your own credit card Receive a complete set of Princeton Review course materials Practice with diagnostic exams during the week class
